summary: A girl in a magical world bets her family's magic that nothing bad will happen when kids from Halloweentown attend high school in the mortal realm.
cast: Kimberly J. Brown|Debbie Reynolds|Judith Hoag|Joey Zimmerman|Emily Roeske|Finn Wittrock|Clifton Davis|Eliana Reyes|Lucas Grabeel|Michael Flynn|Olesya Rulin|Todd Michael Schwartzman|Clayton Taylor|Jesse Harward|Jeff Olson|Frank Gerrish|Mowava Pryor|Darin Southam|Haley McCormick|Mark Reed|Michelle Brinkerhoff|Holly Alderman|Brooke Alderman|Carleton Bluford|Kristin Alayna|John Colosimo|Frank Welker|Chevy Lamont Cofield|Jim Jepson|Aaron Justesen|Heather Kelly|Bob Lanoue|Grant Lee Peterson|Michael Risk|Lisa Spurrier|Josh Twelves
keywords: monster|horror for children|halloween|abominable snowman character|magical purse
title: Halloweentown 3: Academia de brujas
